reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made with a trendy ribbed knit design and appreciate its flattering fit that hits at the waist.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and SOFT, good quality. Will keep you warm!
items.body: I was honestly shocked by how soft this sweater is. I ordered the light blue with white flowers. Very good quality. I am only 5'2" and weight anywhere from 126-132. It's a comfy fit for sure! It is "cropped" but on my short frame the sweater met my mid-rise level pants without showing any of my stomach (unless I raised my arms all the way up). My only complaint, which is more of a "me" problem is that I got hot in it. The material is definitely dense (b/c the sweater doesn't appear thick). BUT, thankfully, not the itchy-material kind of hot. It will keep you warm if you're outside on a cool day and honestly not too thick to wear inside either, unless you are peri-premenopausal like me, lol. Overall a big win with a fair price! AND I received probably 15-20 compliments in one day! Read more
items.author: Mary Potts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft & Comfortable!
items.body: Cute, soft, I love it! Got this in black and cream and they’re both great. Pretty thick, kept me warm! I liked the length, I have a short torso and the sweater hit right at regular rise jeans, perfect for me but if you have a longer mid section it could be short on you. Read more
items.author: Rachel Coffman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous sweater
items.body: Love this sweater so much! The color is perfect, the fit is perfect and the quality is perfect!!! All that is why I get so many compliments on this sweater—it’s my go to sweater! I wore it in Germany on a winter trip and it was the perfect weight! Read more
items.author: K Cumbie Lopez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Quality Sweater, But Not the Right Fit for Me
items.body: This Zeagoo Women's Crewneck Cropped Sweater is super cute and a great deal for the price! The ribbed knit design is trendy and feels high-quality, with a nice thickness that makes it cozy and warm for fall without being too heavy. The material is soft and comfortable against the skin, perfect for all-day wear. It’s cropped but not overly short—it hits right at my hips, and when paired with high-waisted jeans, it would cover the belly area, making it versatile for different outfits. The long sleeves and crewneck add a polished touch, and it’s easy to dress up with a skirt or down with jeans. I ordered a size Medium, and while the quality and comfort are impressive, I’m returning it because I didn’t like the way it fit across my bust—it felt too snug there, but a Large would likely have been too big overall. I’m super picky about sweaters, so this is more about my personal fit preferences than the sweater itself. The craftsmanship and style are top-notch, and I can see this being a fantastic addition to someone else’s wardrobe. For the price, it’s a great value, and I’d recommend it to anyone looking for a stylish, comfortable, and affordable cropped sweater, as long as it suits their body type! Read more
items.author: AMK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater!
items.body: I am very happy with this sweater! The material is a good quality that is soft and stretchy, warm yet still breathable. This is the color beige size xl I'm 200 lbs and it fits great. Definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: Chelsea Lewis

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Soft But
items.body: More form fitting than I’d like. It fits, Definitely is crop. I’m 4’10 105lbs 34C and it hits my waist. I’m more of a square figure so I just feel that it doesn’t do me any justice. If your younger than I am, it will work. Read more
items.author: Cheryl Hagg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific
items.body: I love this so much, I ordered another to gift my friend. Fabric is soft, size is right. I got sz small 5’6 and 116-lbs. Good color and well done “merry” lettering insert Read more
items.author: JQ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice comfortable sweater
items.body: Nice soft knit, fits true to sizing chart. The pink color is very pretty. Read more
items.author: Mrs ID

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Z-merry, Floral Blue, Army Green, Red White Heart, Black, Coffee, Orange, Bowknot Beige, Beige, Bowknot White, Z-apricot Black Stripe, Grey, Z-christmas Print. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
